prismata: Prismata is a free strategy/card game hybrid with no RNG, no P2W, and no bullshit. It has deep PvP, actually smart AI opponents, and a single-player story campaign Kreygasm
basics: Your units are at the bottom, enemy is at the top. You collect resources (bottom left) from drones and buildings to buy an army of attackers (sword) from the available units on the left, then kill all the enemy units SMOrc
f2p: Prismata is a free game, but currently in closed beta! The Founder's pack comes with immediate access, but keys for the free tier are also liberally given away on the discord. Just ask! OhMyDog
key: Keys are being given away liberally on the discord! Just ask! OhMyDog discord .gg/prismata
p2w: All units are available to all players from the start. You can only grind/pay to unlock skins and emotes SeemsGood
absorb: Units must be killed in one shot or they don't die (except Fragile units). If you are attacked for 4 damage, but you have a 5 health Blocker, your Blocker can absorb all 4 damage for free, taking no damage!
defense: Blocker units (marked with a shield) must be killed first before the other units can be attacked. The defender chooses how to assign damage. But if you have enough attack to kill all Blockers, you BREACH! You get to choose what to kill with your remaining attack SMOrc
sets: The 11 units of the base set (first tab) are available to buy in every set. The second tab has a set of 5-11 random units, the same for both players. This makes each game different, but still balanced SeemsGood
blocker: Blocker units (marked with a shield) must be killed first before the other units can be attacked. Blockers only block when they are not clicked (Clicked blockers are marked with a grey shield)
chill: Units with Chill abilities can add an amount of Chill to enemy units. Units can't block this turn if their Chill equals or exceeds their health ‚ùÑ
exhaust: Exhausted units can't do anything. "Click and Exhaust 2" means after clicking it, the unit can't do anything this turn and the turn after ResidentSleeper
fragile: Fragile units (marked with <3 ) can be partially damaged. Normal units have to be killed in one shot
frontline: Frontline units (marked with a blue target) can be attacked directly by the enemy, without having to go through blockers
lifespan: Lifespan units (marked with üíÄ ) will die after a certain number of turns
stamina: Units with Stamina can only be clicked a certain number of times
